desc: The Autoflosser is a revolution in oral hygiene technology, designed for any person who cannot floss using traditional methods.

layout.text: The AutoFlosser - A Dental Floss Guide
Dr. Jackson’s The AutoFlosser is a revolution in oral hygiene technology, designed for any person who cannot floss due to implants, bridges, braces, and bonded retainers.

Dr. Jackson is a board-certified periodontist with additional specialty training as a fixed prosthodontist, focusing on the cosmetic and functional importance of the gums, teeth, jawbone, muscles, and joints. He developed The AutoFlosser based on vast experience in treating and caring for patients with dental implants, bridges, braces and bonded retainers.
